description: One of my friends has a fitness studio with a small massage room. I´ve been always excited by the idea of persuading a boy during a massage. So I just decided to try it. I stopped a few guys on the street and offered them a free massage. I told them it is for a promo video for the recently opened studio. And I offered some money and a free massage. The third boy who I stopped accepted this deal. I don´t know if he realized what all this would be about. But when I asked him to undress he seemed to get a bit nervous. And I must admit that it´s true. There is definitely an explosive sexual tension during such a massage. I finally offered him money for some favors. And now guess what happened.
title: Czech Hunter 35
